product_name: Shimano SH-RO87G Road Bike Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Snug, durable and breathable, the men's Shimano SH-RO87G Road Bike Shoes transfer power to the pedal and comfort to the rider for road-riding performance. Tough stretch-resistant synthetic leather and mesh uppers stay snug on your feet. Micro-adjustable buckle and dual off-set straps provide precise fit management. Shimano Dynalast secures the foot into the ideal ergonomic position for a more efficient upstroke. Shimano Dynalast technology sole is lightweight nylon reinforced with glass fiber. Shimano SH-RO87G Road Bike Shoes are compatible with SPD and SPD-SL cleats, sold separately (SPD pedals can be used only with SPD cleats with the adapter SM-SH40). Closeout.
short_description: Snug, durable and breathable, the men's Shimano SH-RO87G Road Bike Shoes transfer power to the pedal and comfort to the rider for road-riding performance.
